alert.note: Alert for Mainland Monroe (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 24 at 7:54PM EDT until September 24 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Key West
info.description: The National Weather Service in Key West has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lower Keys in Monroe County in Florida... * Until 830 PM EDT. * At 754 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sunset Key, or near Key West, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Key West, Boca Chica Channel Bridge, Boca Chica, Big Coppitt Key, Fleming Key, Key Haven, Sunset Key, and Shark Key. This includes US 1 between mile markers 0 and 9. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
